segments.text: The scene before me tells a story of innocence and impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman’s face focused, blissfully unaware of the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A wave of anxiety washes over me as I watch the boy reach for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it could topple any moment, and my heart races.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the girl’s excitement softens my worry, her hand reaching up in hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost poetic, how their little act of rebellion contrasts with the calm outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but think how easily this scene could shift from joyful to chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR
